originalTitle: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
title: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
content: Ghana's foreign minister says the influencer is a "worthy ambassador", but some Ghanaians criticised the move.

originalTitle: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
title: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
content: Abena Christine Jon'el left the US and now aims to raise the profile of people with disabilities in Ghana.

originalTitle: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
title: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
content: Diezani Alison-Madueke is accused of accepting bribes from industry figures interested in Nigerian government contracts, a court in London has heard.

originalTitle: Iraqi protesters burn photos of Trump amid his threats over al-Maliki
title: Iraqi protesters burn photos of Trump amid his threats over al-Maliki
content: Protesters in Baghdad burned photos of Donald Trump, rejecting the US president’s demands regarding Nouri al-Maliki.

originalTitle: How drone warfare has changed in Ukraine
title: How drone warfare has changed in Ukraine
content: Spools of fibre-optic cable drape the ruins of Lyman, once a resort town in Ukraine, now shaped by drone warfare.

originalTitle: US Federal Reserve holds interest rates steady despite political pressure
title: US Federal Reserve holds interest rates steady despite political pressure
content: The central bank will maintain rates at 3.5 to 3.75 percent and warned of 'elevated' economic uncertainty.

originalTitle: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
content: Tehran says its armed forces are ready "with their fingers on the trigger" to respond to any aggression.

originalTitle: 'Don't take us to a hospital': Iran protesters treated in secret to avoid arrest
title: 'Don't take us to a hospital': Iran protesters treated in secret to avoid arrest
content: Wounded demonstrators tell the BBC they are relying on medics willing to risk their own safety by treating them at their homes.

originalTitle: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
title: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
content: The prime minister seeks to strengthen ties with China but faces fierce criticism from opponents at home.

originalTitle: Sterling leaves Chelsea 18 months early - where could he go next?
title: Sterling leaves Chelsea 18 months early - where could he go next?
content: Raheem Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual consent after reaching an agreement on his departure.

originalTitle: Stranraer expelled as they miss Rangers cup pay day
title: Stranraer expelled as they miss Rangers cup pay day
content: Stranraer miss out on a major pay day against Rangers after being expelled from the Scottish Cup for fielding an ineligible player in last week's victory over Queen's Park.

originalTitle: Stabbed Chelsea fan shocked by Naples attack
title: Stabbed Chelsea fan shocked by Naples attack
content: A Chelsea supporter describes his "shock" after being stabbed and taken to hospital in Naples before the Champions League match against Napoli in Italy.
